Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Granisetron hydrochloride is approved to prevent:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Nausea and vomiting caused by chemotherapy and radiation therapy.

Section.Para: Granisetron hydrochloride is approved to prevent and treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Nausea and vomiting after surgery in adults.

Section.Para: Granisetron hydrochloride is also being studied in the treatment of other conditions.
Granisetron hydrochloride is also available in a different form called granisetron. For more information, see the Drug Information Summary for Granisetron.
